description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

With this one, we've got a little bit of everything: equity, "the science," a medical school sacrificing health and medicine on the altar of wokeness, and a cute blonde bodyshaming fatties.

The girl came across my X-Twitter feed the same way most viral videos do. She says something culture war'y that we're either going to agree or disagree with to the extreme. In her case, it's one we agree with harsh truth bombs. Life is better and easier when you aren't fat, and whether you like it or not. As someone who is in a "f*ck being fat" phase himself this year, I connected.

Then I saw this thread.
title: "F*ck being fat": You'll love this viral body-shamer's message when you see what UCLA is up to
